body:
1. Equip Umezawa's Jitte
2. Accumulate two counters on it
3. Provoke AI to cast Master Thief targeting Umezawa's Jitte
4. In response to "comes into play" effect, make Master Thief get -2/-2 until end of turn (die).

Master Thief dies, but Umezawa's Jitte will be controlled by your opponent, forever. Presumably this also works with any other fast effect removal.

"9/22/2011: If Master Thief ceases to be under your control before its ability resolves, you won't gain control of the targeted artifact at all." http://magiccards.info/m12/en/64.html Magarena 1.27, Debian Linux 64bit (wheezy)
author: [jaze...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/102707833900773093014/)
title: Eternal artifact control with Master Thief
content:
_From [jaze...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/102707833900773093014/) on July 24, 2012 14:19:19_
